parameters: \ts[6]”…Ah, it’s you.\. The other \c[6]child of God\c[0].”
\ts[6]”Thank you. You have brought me back to my senses.”\.
\ts[6]”Umm… My appearance has changed, so I understand that you wouldn’t recognize me.”
\ts[6]”Yes.\. The child of God, or what we usually call an ‘angel.’\. Looking at you, I finally remembered it.”
I was once a \c[6]child of God\c[0], just like you.”
\ts[6]”Unfortunately, I was tricked by the \c[18]people of the temple\c[0], and now, I look like this.”
\ts[6]”So you have yet to regain your memories completely.”
\n<\c[29]Yggdrasil>\ts[6]”I see. I see.\. I think my body is at its limit,\. but even the remaining powers that I have could help you and your memories.”
\ts[6]”Although it was a brief encounter,\. I’m glad I met you,\.\. Lucie.”
\ts[6]”Ah, right, be careful of the \c[18]people of the temple\c[0].\. They have no limits when it comes to greed.”
